                                                           java.lang.String chooserTitle,
                                                           boolean includeCamera,
                                                           java.io.File cameraImage)
        Create an intent to pick an image from device or from camera
        Parameters:
        activity - Current activity
        chooserTitle - Dialog title to show
        includeCamera - If native camera will be included in this intent
        cameraImage - Image file to store camera picture
        Returns:
        An intent to pick an image
